name: Emspoma Against Pain and Tirednes Massage Emulsion 500 ml
descr:
Designed for massage and self-massage with the aim of relieving pain and fatigue in parts of the body or the muscles. It contains effective substances with a positive effect on pain resulting from overloading or uneven load of the motor organs.
 
Dermatologicaly tested. Effect on the skin: Neutral pH-value.
 
Also available in 200 ml and 1000 ml version.
